alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Hocking (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 7:24PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN FAIRFIELD AND NORTHWESTERN HOCKING COUNTIES THROUGH 800 PM EDT... At 724 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Lancaster, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lancaster, Logan, Amanda, Sugar Grove, Clearport, US Route 22 at State Route 159, Buena Vista in Hocking County, Enterprise, Gibisonville, Rockbridge and Lake Logan State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
